website_summaries.verdict: A very inexpensive way to give a little fun or to build a Hatchimal CollEGGTibles collection.
pros: The 4-pack is not very expensive and you get a bonus pre-hatched animal with the set
Kids love the surprise of not knowing what animal they are going to get until it "hatches."
This set is from the newest series
It would be good for a kid who has been collecting for a while
cons: Like all Hatchimals, what you find inside is a random surprise
There may be a twin set inside one egg, but it is not guaranteed

customer_reviews.title: 7 Year Old Approved
customer_reviews.text: The truth is, I hate these things. HOWEVER, they are not for me and my niece LOVED this package at her last birthday party. She even got twins... Whatever that really means. Kid Approved.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: got season 4
customer_reviews.text: I guess “styles may vary” means seasons. I purchased these in the past and received the item pictured. My daughter loved the hatchimals friends version, and I couldn’t find them in store so I purchased them again. This time I received the ones that are in store now, season 4, the pinkish yellow eggs. If you just want hatchimals go for it, but if you want season 3 friends, I wouldn’t recommend. Also, as other reviewers mentioned, my package was also opened, but all items were i it.
customer_reviews.author: Cnic621

customer_reviews.title: Cute set
customer_reviews.text: This was a cute set and one of the eggs had twins! I know nothing about hatchimals including how to hatch them from these smaller eggs—we ended up just squeezing the eggs to bust them open. My daughter read some instructions about rubbing the hearts on the egg to make them change color first that did nothing. My daughter likes these very small figures (perfect size for choking hazard for younger kids) but doesn’t really play with them. The fun seems to be hatching them.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Brannan

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Great value pack! My granddaughter loves these because it's always a surprise to find out what animal you are going to get. This package came ultra quick and was perfectly packaged. Thanks again!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Keller

customer_reviews.title: 3rd Season
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is super excited that the 3rd season of hatchimals is finally available! She loves them so much we ordered another package!
customer_reviews.author: Tara B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little toys :)
customer_reviews.text: I love hatchimals! These are the most unique little things out there. I enjoy opening these cute little guys myself. The eggs crack and you can pull the little animals out. Some even contain twins! Be mindful that the parts are small and can be a choking hazard. Also, the pieces of the shell chip off and can be jagged. We’ve never been hurt by the pieces, but I can imagine it would hurt if the shells fell on the floor and were stepped on.
customer_reviews.author: Ksmom2016

customer_reviews.title: Incentive prize for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: So cute. my daughter, who is 5, loves them! She looks forward to opening them that i have to ration them and use it as an incentive to get her to follow rules. I know I know. But she’s not bratty (yet). Watch out underfoot. They’re just like legos when you step on them. Lol
customer_reviews.author: samdm

customer_reviews.title: We hatched twins!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast! These are so cute and we even hatched twins! They are really well made and they have great quality control!
customer_reviews.author: R. Schuchard

customer_reviews.title: Grandaughter was pleased, for a hot minute.
customer_reviews.text: Personally, I believe all the hatchimals are overpriced. However it is a hot trend. Kids love them. This one included. Surprise is compelling, lures kids in. Grandaughter had fun first few days, then tires of them. Wants new ones. I keep picking them up allover house. I wont purchase anymore. I prefer the spend money on the little critter selections that we can add to and she plays with for much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Micheleo1

customer_reviews.title: Ultra rare
customer_reviews.text: My girls have around one hundred of these little buggers. These ones are super special though because they host the ultra rarest of the rare I guess. The double hearts are sooo special. I don’t really know. I just look at them all and see all the money spent on make believe creatures.
customer_reviews.author: A Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Toys cute, but eggs a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: The toys inside are very cute, but the directions say to rub the hearts until they're pink. The pack I got for my niece already had all pink hearts. Kind of a bummer. But she liked the inside toys so 2 stars it is.
customer_reviews.author: Moxie_2011

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME TOY! A TOTAL HIT!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES her Hatchimals! There are three things every little girl seems to love: - toys with many pieces - small adorable animals - being able to hatch your own critter Hatchimals are pure genius. She has them next to her whether she's playing or doing her homework. She absolutely loves her Hatchimals!
customer_reviews.author: DisneyDenizen

customer_reviews.title: This toy was a hit. Used as a prize.
customer_reviews.text: Opening up these surprise eggs is a treat. Not only for my 5 year old daughter but were a great prize for having accidents at school. She got one every week for no accidents. Might sound crazy but it really helped. But can be used to enforce some positive behavior rewards.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: YAY SHE ACTUALLY GOT A TWIN!
customer_reviews.text: Santa did a really good job this year making sure that my daughter actually was able to get twins out of this pack. She got one of the season 3 suitcases with 30 eggs in it and didn't get a single twin, THAT IS THE WHOLE REASON SHE WANTED THESE EGGS! Glad it worked out for us! As always amazon had a great deal and the shipping was fast!
customer_reviews.author: HayBay

customer_reviews.title: Could be 50’ or taller. I’d recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Everyone knows Hatchimals and love is them. My nieices face is always eggstatic when she sees these things coming.
customer_reviews.author: xIRON MANx

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: The birthday girl had fun cracking the eggs and there were enough to pass around and share the cracking fun. We even got twins in one egg! Great birthday gift for my 6 year old niece.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Stocking Stuffer
customer_reviews.text: I divided up the package to add one to each of my granddaughter’s Christmas stockings along with other small gifts. They like hatchimals and were happy to receive them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you expect
customer_reviews.text: Great little pack, it is Hatchimals and when we opened them we ended up getting one set of twins! My daughter was very excited and even more excited as this is her first set of season 3 Hatchimals.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Z

customer_reviews.title: False advertisements
customer_reviews.text: These are single hat humans not double as shown in the picture. Lies!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great value compared to big box stores!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter collects Hatchimals and has a giant collection. These were the best price I’ve found and all new figures since they’re season three. Would definitely reorder
customer_reviews.author: M Deep23

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got twins in her pack. Was super excited. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: LJ.

customer_reviews.title: More garbage for this world
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand way a let my son convinced me to buy him this garbage. More garbage for this world, just more plastic ......shame of me.
customer_reviews.author: Ajh

customer_reviews.title: Nice present
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this! It's super cute and inspired much imaginative play. I love how the eggs open. So cute.
customer_reviews.author: Love to read

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a long road trip. These are my granddaughters favorite toy and they take up very little space in the vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: J. Erdelyan

customer_reviews.title: Adorable for twin granddaughters!
customer_reviews.text: My twin granddaughters were excited to see twins in one of the eggs !
customer_reviews.author: Mara W.

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for a 5 year old girl. She LOVED them! She needed a little help to crack the eggs but then was able to open them herself. She still plays with these all the time.
customer_reviews.author: JuneBugMomma

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves these Hatchimals. There are a few smaller pieces of but she enjoyed them very much.
customer_reviews.author: LaDy

customer_reviews.title: Not that interesting once they're opened.
customer_reviews.text: Too much hype, too expensive. They don't actually do anything.
customer_reviews.author: Bookism

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loved it....
customer_reviews.text: 6 year old granddaughter loved it.... she loves the little animals inside!
customer_reviews.author: Me in LA

customer_reviews.title: New Hatchimals
customer_reviews.text: The package is just like others and it has hatchimals for a recent version.
customer_reviews.author: Nitorres

customer_reviews.title: What they wanted
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what the attraction is, but the grandkids wanted these. I don't know how well they hold up though.
customer_reviews.author: JillHannah

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift and recipient loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Dana K McConnell

customer_reviews.title: If ur kid likes hatchimals this is a good pickup!
customer_reviews.text: My little one loved them she is big into hatchimals.
customer_reviews.author: Mom in Milton

customer_reviews.title: adorable
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter loves them. Very cute, great price and arrived right on time.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen D.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome 💚💛💙
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute my daughter even got twins in one egg!!
customer_reviews.author: Sugar Lady

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my niece
customer_reviews.text: She loved them. Exactly what she wanted. She dug in the second she saw them.
customer_reviews.author: Alycat

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great products. Very cute. Our 5 year old love them.
customer_reviews.author: JenDH

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my friend's daughter, she loves them! She got her first set of twins and was so excited!
customer_reviews.author: Amy S

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money.
customer_reviews.text: waste of money....Daughter loves it but still waste of money. about 30 cents of product for an outrageous price.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great gift and a welcome surprise if Twins!!
customer_reviews.text: Came just as packaged. I purchased for my 7 year old niece for her birthday and she just loved them! She also was able to “hatch” a set of TWINS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: The hatchimals came quickly and were undamaged. My daughter liked them.
customer_reviews.author: S. McDaniels

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift- get the case too
customer_reviews.text: Really fun gift. Get the carrying case too so you can keep up with them. My 4/5 yr old had a hard time opening some of the eggs and needed help but she lived every bit of it.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Meant as A Gift But Came Open
customer_reviews.text: Product itself is ok (4 out of 5 stars for product's quality)...but packaging was opened and this was supposed to be a gift and wasn't presentable as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: S22

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Packaging is nice on this product. I bought as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Hatchimal lovers dream
customer_reviews.text: My daughter waited for season 3 to come out she loves them
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Loved
customer_reviews.text: I got 3 of these for my girls. They absolutely loved the twins. Something they haven’t had before.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: As always hatchimals are great quality and cheaper than in stores!

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: The kids love them and I got them at half price!

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved them. They were exactly what she wanted.

customer_reviews.title: Loved these!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! My daughter loves them. We even got a set of the blue puppy twins! I ordered a second pack!

customer_reviews.title: GRANDKIDS LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.text: THEY ALL HAD DIFFENT ONES IN THEM VARIETY, GRANDKIDS HAVE FUN COLLECTING

customer_reviews.title: You can get twins
customer_reviews.text: The kids loved them. I ordered three packs and all three packs had a twin set in them.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy

customer_reviews.title: My package came opened
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy that my toy came so fast but when I opened it up the actual hatchimal package seemed to be open already but all the pieces were still inside.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R. Riccardi

product_meta.title: Hatchimals Colleggtibles Season 3, 4 Pack + Bonus (Styles & Colors May Vary) by Spin Master
product_meta.description: All new Hatchimals collectibles are here – and they've brought friends! Hatch season Three Hatchimals collectibles with the 4-pack + bonus set! With over 100 new characters to hatch and collect, you can find Best friends (cute friends who connect), twins (two Hatchimals collectibles in one egg) and sweet squads! To start hatching, use your love and care to warm each egg until the heart on the shell changes color. Press down to crack the shell and see your new friend! There are so many friendly faces to meet! Hatch a whole world with the 4-pack + bonus set!
feature_bullets: Hatch friends forever! Hatch and discover best friends – two characters from separate eggs, who come together to form special poses! Piggybacks, Whispering secrets, hatch-fives and more! For the first time, you can also hatch Twins – two Hatchimals From one egg!
Hatch your collectible, then peel your egg down to the wavy line at the bottom! Throw away the top pieces and now you have a cozy nest – the ideal place to display your adorable friend!

There are over 100 adorable Hatchimals collectibles to find in season Three! Check the color of your Hatchimals’ glittery wings to see if you've hatched a Common, rare, Ultra rare or limited edition Hatchimal!
Hatchimals collectibles are for kids aged 5+.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars374 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
